originalText.text:
We had our car inspected recently there and couldnâ€™t have had a worse experience.

1.) most shockingly they didnâ€™t seem to inspect the call at all, the same day we got a flat and were told all four tires had cracks from wear and tear!

2.) when we got our car back the battery was drained, inexplicably and we needed to get a boost.

3.) customer service was incredibly rude and not helpful. We called multiple days without answer, seeing if it was ready. Finally Friday afternoon we rang at 4pm and someone picked up and said itâ€™s ready, get it now or I charge you $25! I replied we called for days and you havenâ€™t answered. He repeated the same thing about picking it up immediately!

Iâ€™m appalled that they are doing this. Car inspections are no joke and we entrust our safety in your hands!
Luckily no one was injured but hundreds of dollars in tows later, unnecessary aggravation and dealing with a flat in a remote area, we are disgusted by this company and the fact that THIS is how they operate. Weâ€™ll also report this to the Better Businesses Bureau.

originalText.text:
I had an ok experience here. Typical shop - they tried to hussle me and sell me repairs I didn't  need. I took my car in for a full synthetic oil change ($90), new battery ($125 for a 3yr instead of a 5yr battery - that is overpriced) and new wipers. After that work was done, they came back to me said I needed a new alternator (part + labor $495). I said no thanks. I had my alternator checked somewhere else and it was fine, so they were definitely hustling and just trying to make some extra cash off me. Total bummer.

Bonus - the shop is across the street from Fairway so you can walk over and do your grocery shopping while waiting for your car. Also close to dinosaur bbq!

originalText.text: ROBBERY!!!!DO NOT BRING YOUR CAR HERE!!! The skinny receptionist Anna and the mechanic David are crooks. They held my car hostage for 5 weeks all while changing prices on me three times without reasonable explanation. To make matters even worse, proper repairs were not done to my vehicle, instead they merely broke the onboard CPU which  hid the issues for a while longer but ended costing me more in the long run. I was made promises that free work was being done to my vehicle that I did not request. All while I was being charged. Overpriced and underserviced. ROBBERY, ROBBERY, ROBBERY.
